title: After champ select can't connect to server
body: I just played a few games today right before my issues attempting to connect to the server, and had 1 remake due to 2 DC's, and then it happened to me after I re-queued. Attempted to close client and reconnect but the game wouldn't load. Anyone else on West coast experiencing this issue?

replies.body: Hey are you still having this issue now?
Haven't tried since it was a ranked game kinda turned me off from it. Ill try a normal now.
